person.persName: John W. Laughlin (Clark County, Kentucky, drover, postmaster, and shoemaker)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, drover, postmaster, and shoemaker. Kentucky native. Married to Elgetha Keenan Laughlin in Franklin County, Kentucky, in January 1859. Father of Tarlton C. Laughlin, Elizabeth Laughlin, and Henry C. Laughlin. Drover in Clark County in 1850. Postmaster in Clark County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Clark County in 1860. Shoemaker in Clark County in 1863. Postmaster in Clark County in 1863.
